sub_title: TDD International Technical Director TIPPER TECHNOLOGIES
summary:
Mohammed  Hussein Azeez  a B.Sc degree in petroleum engineering with 19 years Experience in oil and Gas industry و I am now the Chairman of two Corporation  for oil trade and oil fields services and Exploration and  Production Corporation in on & Offshore operations ; 

1. Oil industry studies included  whole operations with some drilling problems as a project to USA oil field services company .
2. Well control operations on offshore , consultation with Fries energy company - about Coots & Boots hydraulics well control units -  USA
3. A study relate to rehabilitation of Iraq oil industry focused on drilling technologies presented  to the UK Al Kinndi Engineering conference held on Baghdad  November 2008.
4. Technical paper about Underbalanced ( UBD ) & Choosing of travel block speed  presented to SOC Drilling Manager ( private consultation ) – 2009.  
5.Technical paper and results gained  for best drilling practices  of sever losses treatment On Rumaila oil field by three contractors ( Schlumberger  , Turkish International Drilling company  ( TIPIC ) , Daqing Contractor DQ drilling company  considered by BP&CNPC   by presented to  their Field Staff ; the paper showed the save of time  and cost in drilling operation within losses formation and sulphur water flow ( about 6 days saved for whole well drilling operation for well depth 3450m & about 2 MM USD saved.
6.Trip pressure drop excel calculation and bottom up circulation form presented to ROO Management Drilling Staff .
7.Technical reports indicate the ZFOD drilling program revision presented for SOC & ENI drilling department.
8.Technical paper about  stuck pipe events in Zubair Field , it will be as presentation  in ICWEE’2013 conference in Turkey .
                                            http://icwee2013.ikc.edu.tr
9.Development  plan of two of an oil field in Iraq expect to will  by Island Energy Corps.

Specialties: Drilling Projects
Rigs Audit.

HS
